summary: A drifter at an amusement park finds himself both the bodyguard and hit man of a man targeted by a criminal gang.
cast: Buster Keaton|Bartine Burkett|Charles Dorety|Ingram B. Pickett|Joe Roberts|Al St. John
director: Directors: Edward F. Cline (as Eddie Cline), Buster Keaton (as 'Buster' Keaton)
title: El guardaespaldas
